We handle it

No worries and a super-smooth process. From planning to moving in. That's our promise. While you relax, we take care of:

  • ✔ Permitting
  • ✔ Construction
  • ✔ After-care

Carbon-neutral

Haaven spaces are all built carbon neutral by default. Moreover, we optimise all our spaces for hotel-grade thermal performance.

  • ✔ Carbon neutral build
  • ✔ Hospital-grade air filtration
  • ✔ Hotel-grade thermal performance

World-class design

Design is how it works, but it's more than a four walls and a roof. No details is too minute for us and our top-notch architectural and engineering partners.

  • ✔ Award-winning architects
  • ✔ Designed for ultimate comfort
  • ✔ AI-driven performance engineering

Simple construction process

Haaven spaces are made using our best-in-class prefab construction system. Simply put, this means no time and cost overruns. Plus, a lifetime of living enjoyment.

  • ✔ 10 year warranty
  • ✔ Move-in within 10 weeks
  • ✔ Increases the value of your home
